palette.title: Lena's Love Letter
palette.description:
To: My Dearest Lovely Lovers
I would like to like to thank you all ,my awesome, wonderful, lovely lovers, so very much for all the love and support you give me. I would also like to thank you all for always inspiring me, brightening up my dull days and for letting me know that someone cares. I am so very grateful to you all. So from the bottom of the muscular organ that pumps blood throughout my blood vessels, a.k.a my heart, thank you!
L‚ù§VE, Lena
P.s- I know this is really cheesy and tacky, but I'm no good with this touchy talking about your feelings stuff so no need tell me what I already know and stuff. It's embarrassing enough I even let myself post it.
Ranked #3 on 2.4.2010 Ranked #1 on 2.15.2010
